column2: and you pretty much can't go wrong with any dish. There's some dishes that have stood the test of time since the original Austin opening
column3: and some new ones from Cole's flavor experiments. Experiment is a good descriptor. The purpose of Uchi is supposed to be a daring
column5: take on sushi. I wouldn't define it strictly as fusion
column6: but it's not going to have a Japanese-only menu plastered to the wall
